info.title: API Immodvisor

aapp_date_last_connect.description: date of last login to the application

created_by.description: place where the professional was created

app.description: access authorization to the Immodvisor PRO application

pro.description: access authorization to the PRO area

id.description: unique Immodvisor ID of the review

date.description: date of validation of the review

last_update.description: date of last modification of the review

deposit_date.description: date of submission of the review

job.description: job of the person who answered

signature.description: name of the person who answered

name.description: name of the experience associated with the review, example : housing delivered

signature.description: name of the person who answered

job.description: job of the person who answered

id.description: unique Immodvisor ID of the review

date.description: date of validation of the review

nbr_pros.description: number of pros related to the team

id.description: ID Immodvisor of the pro linked to the team
unique Immodvisor ID of the folder

hide_city.description: if true, the company city will not be visible on immodvisor.com

hide_address.description: if true, the company address will not be visible on immodvisor.com

domains.description: list of domains authorized to display them

values.description: Possible values list for the types ENUM and REPEATED_ENUM

morning_appointment.description: open in the morning by appointment only

afternoon_appointment.description: open in the afternoon by appointment only

url.description: Company's file absolute url on immodvisor.com

rating.description: score out of 5, empty if no opinion

logo.description: URL of the logo on Immodvisor.com

background.description: URL of the background image on Immodvisor.com

medias.description: list of media present on the Immodvisor.com showcase and on the portals

Immodvisor_partners.description: list of the company's Immodvisor partners

richsnippet.description: code to be integrated on the company's page

rating_google.description: Google's overall rating of the company out of 5 (only for companies with the Gomybusiness product activated)

nbr_reviews_google.description: number of Google reviews (only for companies with the Gomybusiness product activated)

get.description: Retrieve all company's informations. If neither of the two identifiers is provided, then the company linked to the API key is returned.

parameters.name: nbr_reviews
parameters.description:
last notices' number to return. Possible values :
0 : default value, tags nbr_reviews and reviews are not returned.
-1 : all reviews are sent
[int] : last reviews sent last number

get.description:
Retrieve brand's companies informations in addition with brand's informations.
Also retrieves the last N reviews for each company

**Note**: {COMPANY} objects in this service do not return richsnippets information.

**Limitation** : only a company of type 'brand' is allowed to call this service.

parameters.name: nbr_reviews
parameters.description: Last notices' number to return per company.  By default 0, maximum 5. To retrieve previous notices, see the reviewList() service. This parameter adds an array of reviews objects to the return.

parameters.name: enable
parameters.description: if true returns only active companies, if false returns all companies. True by default.

nbr_companies.description: Company's children associated with the brand number

nbr_reviews.description: Number of review returned relating to companies associated with the brand

reviews.description: Only if nbr_reviews parameter is specify.

get.description:
Retrieves the Rich Snippets code to embed directly on the company page of your website. No additional processing is required. Only active companies have Rich Snippets.

**Limitation**: only a 'brand' company is allowed to call this service.

richsnippet.description: code to be integrated on the company's page

post.description:
Create a new company of type 'company'.

**Warning**, the specific Google elements, for example :google_attributes, cannot be added when creating the agency via the api. Indeed, a reconciliation with the Google record of the agency must first be done by Immodvisor. To update this type of value, use the updatecompany endpoint. When the value presence_management=1, the reconciliation with the Google record is effective.

short_name.description: company's short name, useful in case the name exceeds 50 characters

hide_city.description: if true, the company city will not be visible on immodvisor.com

hide_address.description: if true, the company address will not be visible on immodvisor.com

color.description: color of the window on Immodvisor.com

put.description:
Updating a company. 

**Note** : To not update a data, just don't send it. To empty a data, you must send an empty or null value. The fields 'name', 'city' and 'department' cannot be emptied, because they are mandatory for the proper functioning of the Immodvisor site.

**Warning**, the treatments linked to presence management are done asynchronously, it is therefore normal not to recover updated data during an update.

**Warning**, for array elements, the whole element must be sent during the update. The elements not sent will be set to null.

At least one of the two identifiers must be sent.

short_name.description: company's short name, useful in case the name exceeds 50 characters

hide_city.description: if true, the company city will not be visible on immodvisor.com

hide_address.description: if true, the company address will not be visible on immodvisor.com

color.description: color of the window on Immodvisor.com

post.description:
Adds an activity/service to your company.

**Note** : this endpoint is only valid for companies of type 'company'. You can find possible services' list by querying the activity endpoint. It is recommended to define 3 or 4.

id.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to update (company or brand). optional if custom_id present.

custom_id.description: Your unique company's identifier to update (company or brand). Optional if id present.

delete.description:
Delete an activity/service from your company.

**Note** : this endpoint is only valid for companies of type 'company'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to update (company or brand). optional if custom_id present.

parameters.name: custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's identifier to update (company or brand). Optional if id present.

post.description:
Add a partner to the company's web page.

**Note: this endpoint is only valid for companies of type 'company'.

id.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to update (company or brand). optional if custom_id present.

custom_id.description: Your unique company's identifier to update (company or brand). Optional if id present.

type.description: immodvisor or external, specifies if it is a partner customer of Immodvisor or other

url.description: url of the public file for the type immodvisor, optional parameter otherwise

logo.description: Logo's file, mandatory for the external type, useless otherwise.

delete.description:
Delete a partner from the company's web page.

**Note: this endpoint is only valid for companies of type 'company'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to update (company or brand). optional if custom_id present.

parameters.name: custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's identifier to update (company or brand). Optional if id present.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: immodvisor or external, specifies if it is a partner customer of Immodvisor or other

schema.description: url of the public file for the type immodvisor, optional parameter otherwise

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: only for type external, position of the element to be deleted in the list of external partners received via the endpoint company/get

post.description:
Add a media to the company.
**Note** : if this endpoint is called with the type logo or background and there is already a photo filled in, the existing photo will be overwritten. For the gallery type, the media is added afterwards.

id.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to update (company or brand). optional if custom_id present.

custom_id.description: Your unique company's identifier to update (company or brand). Optional if id present.

category.description: media category to add among logo, background and gallery

type.description: only for the photo or video gallery category

url.description: Video's url. Only for the gallery category and the video type. Are accepted the url Youtube, Dailymotion, Vimeo and Matterport.

photo.description: photo to add, useless for the gallery category with the video type

all.description: only for the gallery category and the 'brand' companies. If true, will be displayed on all child companies.

delete.description: Delete a media from a company

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to update (company or brand). optional if custom_id present.

parameters.name: custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's identifier to update (company or brand). Optional if id present.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: media category to add among logo, background and gallery

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of the item to be deleted in the company's media list. Only for the gallery type.

post.description:
Allow adding attributes to the Google listing.

**Warning**, the new Google attributes cancel and replace the previous ones.

id.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to update (company or brand). optional if custom_id present.

custom_id.description: Your unique company's identifier to update (company or brand). Optional if id present.

attributes.description: Google attribute table. To get the list of Google attributes see the endpoint : getactivity. example : attributes[has_wheelchair_accessible_entrance]=true The type of value to send for each attribute is specified in the endpoint.

get.description: Retrieves all pro's informations associated with the company linked to the key, or associated with at least one of the companies in the fleet managed by the brand.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Immodvisor unique identifier of the pro account

get.description: Retrieves all pros' informations associated with the company linked to the key, or associated with at least one of the companies in the fleet managed by the brand.

parameters.name: company_custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's ID (company or brand).

parameters.name: enable
parameters.description: If 'true', only get activated pros in the activated companies too. 'true' by default.

post.description:
Creation of a new professional account, directly associated with a company in the park. The professional will automatically receive his login information by email.

**info** : For brands only, it is mandatory to provide either the company_id or the company_custom_id. For 'company' type companies, these 2 parameters are useless because the pro will be automatically associated to the company linked to the API key.

company_id.description: Company's Immodvisor's ID (company or grand) to which pro account will be associate.

company_custom_id.description: Your unique company's ID (company or brand).

acl_aapp.description: authorization to use the Immodvisor PRO application

acl_pro.description: access rights to the PRO area

put.description:
Update a pro account. If the email address is modified, the professional will receive an email informing him/her of his/her new login information.

**Note** : To not update a data, just don't send it. To empty a data, you must send an empty or null value. The fields 'email', 'acl_aapp' and 'acl_pro' cannot be emptied, because they are mandatory for the proper functioning of the Immodvisor site.

id.description: unique Immodvisor identifier of the pro

acl_aapp.description: access authorization to the Immodvisor PRO application

acl_pro.description: access authorization to the PRO area

post.summary: Associate a pro to a company
post.description:
Associate a pro account to a company. An account can be associated with several companies in the park, and has the same acl_aapp and acl_pro rights for all these companies.

**Limitation** : only a company of type 'brand' is authorized to call this service.

id.description: Pro's Immodvisor's unique identifier to associate.

custom_id.description: Your unique pro's identifier to dissociate.

company_id.description: Company's Immodvisor's unique identifier to associate.

company_custom_id.description: Your unique company's identifier to associate.

delete.summary: separate a pro from a company
delete.description:
Disassociates a pro account from a company. If the pro is only associated with a company, this link cannot be broken.

**Limitation** : only a company of type 'brand' is authorized to call this service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Pro's Immodvisor's unique identifier to dissociate.

parameters.name: custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique pro's identifier to dissociate.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: unique Immodvisor company ID to be dissociated

parameters.name: company_custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's identifier to dissociate.

get.description:
Retrieves the configuration associated to the API key.

**Good to know** : if the company_id corresponds to a brand (company.type='brand'), then the API key is valid on all companies (company.type='company') belonging to the brand. Moreover, some services are limited to brands.

id_company.description: Company's identifier associated with the API key.

items.description: Authorized ips to call the API.

get.description: Get the list of authorized departments on Immodvisor.

Retrieves reviews from one or all companies in the park.
      
All inputs work as filters. For companies of type 'company', the first 2 inputs are useless.

**Tip:**
Save the reviews in your data system, via an automated script that retrieves only the reviews of the period not yet retrieved, for example week by week, or month by month.

parameters.name: date_start
parameters.description: start date of the search (YYYY-MM-DD : year + month + day). The date indicated is included. If the start date is not indicated, then it takes the value of the date of creation of the company on Immodvisor.

parameters.name: date_stop
parameters.description: Search's end date (same format accepted). If the end date is not filled in, then it takes the value of the current date.

parameters.name: date_filter
parameters.description:
Defines on which fields the dates are filtered :
  * If not specified, filters dates based on the validation date
  * If 'update', filters dates based on the last modification date (either validation, update or answer)

get.summary: List of rejected or archived reviews
get.description:
Returns rejected or archived reviews from one or all companies in the park. Helps you retrieve reviews that should no longer be displayed. 
If the company_id is not filled in, then the notices returned will correspond to the rejected or archived notices of the brand or company associated with the API key.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: unique Immodvisor identifier of the company

id.description: unique Immodvisor ID of the review

post.description:
Create an email collection for a customer. This service allows you to collect reviews one by one as soon as a transaction is registered in your systems.
The collection sends an email invitation to the customer, and in case no review is filed, an automatic reminder is sent 7 days later.

For brands, provide either company_id or company_custom_id. A review cannot be filed on a brand.

If the contact has a review or request that is less than 15 days old, the collection will be blocked.

**Tip** : As soon as a mobile number is sent, the API will send an SMS to your customer. If you want to send an email, just don't specify the customer's mobile.

pro_id.description: Immodvisor identifier of the professional at the origin of the notice

pro_custom_id.description: Your pro's identifier who created the notice. If your collaborator IDs are registered with Immodvisor, you can use your own IDs instead of the Immodvisor IDs

activity_id.description: The company's business line concerned by the notification. By default the first business of the company. If the company has only one job it is useless to fill this value.

highlight_number.description: number of highlight linked to the job. If the highlights are activated on the company and they have been defined, you can transmit the highlight number that will be associated with the notification so that the notification questionnaire takes the parameters of the highlight and the statistics of the highlight are updated. The highlight numbers can be found in your Pro Area, under the heading "Highlights".

custom_ref.description: Your solicitation reference. You can transmit an internal reference for each solicitation, which will then be returned in the notices returned by the API. Allowed characters: numbers, lower case letters, upper case letters, hyphens and underscores.

lang.description: Language associated with the collection for translation of the email and the deposit. If this is not specified, it will be determined either by the mobile code, if specified, or by the company's default selection.

post.description:
Launch a collection of reviews on several customers. This service works in the same way as the collectreview service except that it allows several simultaneous sendings, and that the sendings are asynchronous. This service is ideal for collecting reviews at regular intervals (e.g. collecting reviews every 1st of each month for the previous month's customers).

For brands, provide either company_id or company_custom_id.

If the contact has a review or request that is less than 15 days old, the collection will be blocked.

**Limitation**: maximum 500 submissions per call

pro_id.description: Immodvisor identifier of the professional at the origin of the notice

pro_custom_id.description: Your pro's identifier who created the notice. If your collaborator IDs are registered with Immodvisor, you can use your own IDs instead of the Immodvisor IDs

activity_id.description: The company's business line concerned by the notification. By default the first business of the company. If the company has only one job it is useless to fill this value.

highlight_number.description: Peak time linked's number to the job. If the highlights are activated on the company and they have been defined, you can transmit the highlight number that will be associated with the notification so that the notification questionnaire takes the parameters of the highlight and the statistics of the highlight are updated. The highlight numbers can be found in your Pro Area, under the heading "Highlights".

custom_ref.description: Your solicitation reference. You can transmit an internal reference for each solicitation, which will then be returned in the notices returned by the API. Allowed characters: numbers, lower case letters, upper case letters, hyphens and underscores.

lang.description: Language associated with the collection for translation of the email and the deposit. If this is not specified, it will be determined either by the mobile code, if specified, or by the company's default selection.

post.summary: Add an answer to a review
post.description: This service allows you to respond to a review.

review_id.description: unique Immodvisor identifier of the review

job.description: profession of the professional who provides the answer

signature.description: signature of the professional who provides the answer

patch.summary: Edit an answer to a review
patch.description: This service allows you to respond to a review.

answer_id.description: unique Immodvisor identifier of the answer

job.description: profession of the professional who provides the answer

signature.description: signature of the professional who provides the answer

post.description: This service allows you to add evidence to a review.

review_id.description: unique Immodvisor identifier of the review

file.description: js object of the file to upload

get.description: Return company or brand teams list.

parameters.name: company_custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's ID. (unused if 'company_id' is present)

post.description:
Create a new team. Once the team is created, you can add / remove professionals from the linkpro and unlinkpro methods.

At least one of the two company IDs must be transmitted.

company_id.description: Immodvisor identify of the company on which to create a team

company_custom_id.description: Your company's ID to create a team.

put.description: Update of a team. Only the data entered are updated.

post.summary: Associate a pro to a team
post.description:
Associate a professional with a team. A professional can be associated to several teams.

If a custom_id or pro_custom_id field is filled in, it must be correct for the action to be executed.

pro_custom_id.description: Yours unique Pro's identifier to associate.

delete.summary: Dissociate a pro from a team.
delete.description:
Dissociate a pro from a team.
        
If a custom_id or pro_custom_id field is filled in, it must be correct for the action to be executed.

parameters.name: pro_custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique pro's identifier to dissociate.

post.description:
Create a collection for a customer. This service allows you to collect reviews on google one by one as soon as a transaction is registered in your systems. 
The collection sends an invitation by email or sms to the customer, with an automatic reminder sent 7 days later.

For brands, provide either company_id or company_custom_id. A notice cannot be filed on a brand.

mobile.description: Customer's mobile number. If present, the customer will receive a texting message instead of an email.

type.description: The default value is 'mail', if the value is 'sms' the mobile parameter becomes mandatory.

sms_content.description: Only in the case of sending text message ('sms'). If it is not filled in, Immodvisor will automatically fill it in an optimized content. This parameter is an array of two elements.

senderName.description: Name sent in the text message's title, without spaces and special characters.

sending_date.description: Date in dateTime format (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss) which determine the collection's sent date. If it is not filled in, the collection is sent at the earliest.

post.description:
Launch a collection of google requests on several customers. This service works in the same way as the google collect service except that it allows several simultaneous sends, and that the sends are asynchronous.

**Important** : the service can return a Successs even if all the sendings could not be done. You have to process the response to see the details of the sendings.

mobile.description: Customer's mobile number. If present, the customer will receive a texting message instead of an email.

type.description: The default value is 'mail', if the value is 'sms' the mobile parameter becomes mandatory.

sms_content.description: Only in the case of sending text message ('sms'). If it is not filled in, Immodvisor will automatically fill it in an optimized content. This parameter is an array of two elements.

senderName.description: Name sent in the text message's title, without spaces and special characters.

sending_date.description: Date in dateTime format (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss) which determine the collection's sent date. If it is not filled in, the collection is sent at the earliest.

get.description:
Retrieves Google reviews from one or all companies in the park.

All inputs work as filters. For companies of type 'company', the first 2 inputs are useless.

parameters.name: date_start
parameters.description: start date of the search (YYYY-MM-DD : year + month + day). The date indicated is included. If the start date is not indicated, then it takes the value of the date of creation of the company on Immodvisor.

parameters.name: date_stop
parameters.description: Search's end date (same format accepted). If the end date is not filled in, then it takes the value of the current date.

get.description: Return folders list from a company on Immodvisor.

parameters.name: company_custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's identifier (can be used instead of company_id if it is filled in on Immodvisor).

company_id.description: Immodvisor company ID on which to create a folder

company_custom_id.description: Your company's ID to create a folder.

put.description: Update a folder/program. Only the data entered are updated.

parameters.name: company_custom_id
parameters.description: Your unique company's identifier (can be used instead of company_id if it is filled in on Immodvisor).

get.description: Retrieve the activity's informations : username, lastname, list of possible services and list of associated Google My Business attributes.
